thread.title: Halloween Party at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa
thread.title_full: Halloween Party at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa

author: Sirisawan
title: Halloween Party at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa
text:
Home » Travel & Food » Halloween Party at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Halloween Party at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Written by Sirisawan | September 19, 2015 | 0 | Halloween – Live DJ Party on the Private Pier 
On Saturday 31th October 2015, Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Halloween party of the year. Dress up in your most sinful costume and check in to the Creepy Pier Night Halloween, if you dare. Join us for a night of mysterious, ghostly encounters and ghoulish grooves by live DJ’s, Fire performers, Halloween Decorations, Spooky Entrainment. 
Spinning a night from 6.00 pm – 0.00 am Ticket : 1,500 Baht Free flow: Halloween Cocktail/ Beer / Soft drink / Finger foods whole night !!! Lady in Costume Half Price !!! Call: 063 064 0661
